subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Stanley Burrell does not have a catchy nickname like the Sheriff or Mr. Defense. Burrell, the senior guard from Xavier, is building a résumé as college basketball’s best perimeter defender.
snippet: Stanley Burrell does not have a catchy nickname like the Sheriff or Mr. Defense. Burrell, the senior guard from Xavier, is building a résumé as college basketball’s best perimeter defender.
